welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Coatesville, where small town charm meets big city opportunities. From our historical landmarks to our vibrant community, we invite you to experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and embrace the beauty of Coatesville!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Chestercounty Carlson Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments at Chestercounty Carlson Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport houses all passenger services and amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
